articles.author: Jeff Gammage
articles.title: Ukrainian hearts sink in Philly as Trump pivots toward Russia - The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.description: “To see an American president betray Ukraine like this is really beyond words,” said Mary Kalyna, who is active in the Philadelphia Ukrainian community.
articles.content: Philadelphia is where the Russian flag was twice stolen from the Benjamin Franklin Parkway, as Ukrainian American activists demanded it be permanently removed from the boulevards iconic rows of banne… [+7785 chars]
